title: The Imaginary Iceberg - best defines stanza's role

content.question: Which statement best defines the role of the second stanza?

choices.label: It shifts the focus of the poem to a new central figure.
It amplifies the regard expressed in the first stanza.
It reveals the speakerâ€™s private motivations.
It re-creates the fantasies of childhood.

content.answer: It amplifies the regard expressed in the first stanza.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
